name: Notion Professional Resume
description: In need of a professional-looking resume template for your application needs? Well, look no further with this FREE Notion template:Minimalistic resume with a grayscale colour palettePre-built template buttons for your inputsToggle-hide lengthy job descriptions to have your previous roles stand outExport to PDF or attach it to your portfolio siteHow to download the template?Open the template link, then click "Duplicate" on the top right-hand corner to duplicate it to your workspace.
features: Minimalisticresume with a grayscale colour palette; Pre-builttemplate buttons for your inputs; Toggle-hidelengthy job descriptions to have your previous roles stand out; Exportto PDF or attach it to your portfolio site
